attributes.action: Give the police more power to deal with menacing individuals or groups.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Giving "Kids" The power to take over the law is wrong. Why should people pay for the police not having the power to do anything? I Say That we give police the power to put people into their place if an event that is causing local distress occurs. Empty threats do nothing but make them want to do this more. So i think its time that this government stood up to the kids of today. 

Brett Strachan, Aberdeen. 16 Years Of Age.
